testcase.classname: To validate the login functionallity using invalid credentials
testcase.name: To validate login using invalid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given User must be in facebook login page...................................passed When User enter invalid username and invalid password.......................passed And User click login button.................................................passed Then User must be in invalid credentials page..............................passed

testcase.classname: To validate the forgot password functionallity
testcase.name: To validate forgot password
testcase.system-out: Given User is in facebook page..............................................passed When User click Forget password.............................................passed And User User must be in find account page..................................passed And User enter value in text field and click search.........................passed Then User must identify his account.........................................passed
